html: Of the people "For the people"—, Before the word ,העם , haam, the people, two MSS. insert ,יהוה , Yehovah,; one MS. adds the same word after; and eight MSS., three ancient, instead of ,העם , haam, have ,יהוה , Yehovah, and so likewise one edition. But though it makes a good sense either way, I believe it to be an interpolation, as the ancient Versions do not favor it. The Septuagint indeed read ,עמי , ammi, my people. - L.
